law.catch_line: The Secretary may revoke a permit on a finding that the holder:...

text.section:
The Secretary may revoke a permit on a finding that the holder:
does not meet the qualifications described in § 5-306 of this subtitle; or
violated § 5-308 of this subtitle.
A holder of a permit that is revoked by the Secretary shall return the permit to the Secretary within 10 days after receipt of written notice of the revocation.
